forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain likely. High 14C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with periods of rain. High 58F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.
